DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study assess bioequivalence D961S esomeprazole/buffered ASA , safety , tolerability esomeprazole combination ASA pharmacokinetics ( PK ) D961S , esomeprazole buffer ASA follow repeat administration healthy male Japanese subject .
DOC.brief_title: Study Assess Bioequivalence Between D961S Esomeprazole/Buffered Acetylsalicylic Acid ( ASA ) Japanese Healthy Male Subjects
DOC.detailed_description: A Phase I , Open label , Randomized , Single center , 2 way Crossover Bioequivalence Study Comparing D961S ( Fixed-dose Combination Capsule Esomeprazole 20 mg Acetylsalicylic Acid 81 mg ) Free Combination Esomeprazole Capsule 20 mg + Buffered Acetylsalicylic Acid Tablet 81 mg After Repeated Oral Administration Japanese Healthy Male Subjects
DOC.criteria: Healthy Japanese male 2045 year age Classified homoEM Negative HIV , Hepatitis B , Hepatitis C syphilis Body Mass Index ( BMI=weight/height2 ) 1927 ( kg/m2 ) Body weight 5085 kg Significant clinical illness 2 week precede preentry visit randomization Past present cardiac , renal , hepatic , neurological gastrointestinal disease Need concomitant medication study Past present NSAIDs induce asthma History bleeding diathesis
